title: Ep 168: The Whiteness of Wealth with Dorothy Brown
itunes:title: Ep 168: The Whiteness of Wealth with Dorothy Brown
itunes:subtitle: Kate finishes season one of Call My Agent and decides Doree is right about everything and Doree settles in for the long haul with a dark book rec. Then, Professor of Law and advocate for economic and social justice Dorothy Brown joins them to talk abou...
description:
Kate finishes season one of Call My Agent and decides Doree is right about everything and Doree settles in for the long haul with a dark book rec. Then, Professor of Law and advocate for economic and social justice Dorothy Brown joins them to talk about her book The Whiteness of Wealth, the surprisingly interesting and shocking history of tax laws, and why she got fired from doing her parents' taxes.  


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter  

 

This week’s episode is sponsored by:
